com.aisandbox.util

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aisandbox.util.Area

  • public class Area
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an area within a level. Based on two Vector2 objects, min and max.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Area()
      Class constructor, initialize min and max to zero vectors.
      Area(float minX, float minY, float maxX, float maxY)
      Class constructor.
      Area(Vector2 min, Vector2 max)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Whether or not the given coordinates lie within this area.

      Whether or not the given coordinates lie within this area.

      Get the center point of this area.
      float getHeight()
      Get the height of this area.
      Vector2 getMax()
      Get max vector's values.

      Get min vector's values.
      float getWidth()
      Get the width of this area.
